body:
Grasshope, For a detailed explanation of outdoor air, see our other discussion: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1375974&xg_source=msg) For almost everything else, you correct.  There's only a few corrections: [3] surfaceEnergyFlow
=
[opaqueEnergyFlow] Surface Average Face Conduction Heat Transfer Energy
+
[glazEnergyFlow] Surface Window Heat Gain Energy -
[glazEnergyFlow] Surface Window Heat Loss Energy
[4] opaqueEnergyFlow
=
Surface Average Face Conduction Heat Transfer Energy
[5] glazEnergyFlow
=
Surface Window Heat Gain Energy -
Surface Window Heat Loss Energy Let me know if you have any feedback about the outputs that I thought were useful and how I combine some of them. -Chris
